title: TUESDAY 4/13 - JULIAN EDELMAN CALLS IT A CAREER
itunes:title: TUESDAY 4/13 - JULIAN EDELMAN CALLS IT A CAREER
description:
Longtime Patriots wide receiver Julian Edelman (0:05) hangs it up after 11 seasons in the NFL. Sam Darnold (0:58) talks about the trade that sent him to the Panthers. In free agent news, Jadeveon Clowney (1:38) visiting the Browns, while James Conner (1:54) pays a visit to the Valley of the Sun. Giovani Bernard (2:08) joins the Super Bowl champs and Trevor Lawrence (2:33) ties the knot

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
